comments.body:
now you're dividing things by attr.strides.h, w, and c.  thus, this condition now needs to include =, i.e.

if (attr.strides.h <= 0 || ...)

Good catch. But I would suggest adding a separate check for zero strides. Just so different types of error don't get mixed together i.e. reverse slicing being a valid operation that just isn't supported (yet) and zero strides which are invalid.
